msbt.message: Livin' on this island ain't bad, but I've been thinkin' I might just pull up stakes here and move. Sure, I got lotsa friends 'round these parts, but I wonder what's out there for me, on other islands. Doesn't the idea of a brand-new place set your heart to racin'?

, can I bend your ear for a bit?Been thinking about movin' on It's not that I hate this place or nothin'! Nah, just the opposite. Think I'm gettin' too comfortable I wanna broaden my horizons, test myself by goin' elsewhere. Guess I'm the adventurin' sort.
I don't want you to go!

I've made up my mind! I'm leavin' for a new island, !Did I shock you? I mean, I just decided here on the spot! I wanna see how I do somewhere new. Hemmin' and hawin' about this stuff does no good. Gotta strike while the iron's hot, I reckon!
Aw, come on now Now you went and made my determination waver. Alright, alright. You win, kiddo. Guess I'll stick around a mite longer.
Well, color me flummoxed! Didn't know you cared.What am I gonna do with you, kiddo?Guess I ain't movin'! You talked this old into lingerin' around.

I'll be hornswoggled! You want me to stay?Hard to stay the course while yer twistin' my arm<10_4 /> Fine! I'll cancel my plan to move. I reckon I can stick around a mite longer. Why mess with this good thing we got goin'?
That's the spirit! Hope you know what a big help you've been to me 'round here, .When I'm gone, it'll be up to you to look after all these fine folk. I'm countin' on you, !
Thanks for yer support, kiddo. Now I can leave all this behind with no regrets, ! You've been great, and I hope you go on livin' a great life here after I move on. See you around, maybe.

It's still a bit early for goodbyes, but I wanna let you know you've been a big help to me, kiddo! I reckon it was fun livin' here. Now that we're pals and all that, here's hopin' we meet up again. Watch for me out yonder, OK?
